5) Run Fruity Loops and enjoy your sweet music

FINALLY, a download of FL Studio that ACTUALLY WORKS!!!!

I decided to write an additional set of instructions for getting this cracked in case there's anyone out there having problems with it. A user named Littledre wrote some instructions in an earlier post (which I followed to get mine working) but no offense to Littledre, they were pretty hard to make any sense of. These on the other hand will be written in proper English instead of "interweb speak".

But first of all to all those saying this torrent has a virus and/or malware included in it I say you're full of shit. It seems that most of the people complaining of viruses in this torrent are using AVG or some other piece of shit AV scanner. Anyone who knows their ass from a hole in the ground knows that AVG is FAMOUS for giving false positives. Get yourself a REAL AV scanner like NOD32. NOD32 is simply the best of the best IMO. I installed this torrent along with the additional required cracks and got no type of virus what so ever.

So with that said on to the instructions.

First off, download the torrent on this page. There is a reg file/crack included with it but I've tried several reg files trying to get FL cracked and none of them worked. And if they do actually work you have to set your system clock back to fool it and by doing that IE thinks all the secruity certificates for websites you visit are expired and it's just overall a big headache.

Secondly download both of these torrents:

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3688396/Fruity_Loops_Update_2

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3687798/FL_Studio_7_crack_Fruity_Loops_7_Crack

Littledre's instructions say that if you are using Windows Vista that you will have to reboot into safe mode before installing and cracking FL. I'm using Vista and to avoid any headaches I booted into safe mode like his instructions said. I don't know if this is required or not, but I did it anyway. I was a little scared to do this after so many fuckwads complaining of viruses in this torrent but I took the risk. Booting into safe mode for Vista users may or may not be required. Maybe another visa user can try it without booting into safe mode and tell me. Littledre goes on to say that if you're an XP user than rebooting into safe mode isn't necessary.

After booting into safe mode (if you're a vista user) install FL using the setup file from the torrent on this page. 

Next unrar the Fruity Loops Update 2 file.

Browse to the directory where FL is installed or right click the FL icon on your desktop, choose "properties" and use the "find target" option (XP), or simply right click and choose "open file location" if youre a vista user.

There are several files in the FL Update 2 but you only need three of them which are ELASTIQUE.DLL, FLENGINE.DLL, and DSP_IPP.DLL.

Replace the corresponding DLL files in the FL Directory with the ones from the Update 2 archive. You can backup the originals if you want to but I just replaced them. It's up to you. 

Next unrar the FL_Studio_7_crack_Fruity_Loops_7_Crack file. Inside this archive is a file named "crack.exe". Drag and drop or copy and paste the crack.exe file into your FL directory and run it.

Click the "crack" button in the crack.exe application and it should say that FL was patched successfully.

Littledre said that additionally you need to drag to crack.exe file and drop it on top of the fl.exe file in your FL directory which again I don't know if it's necessary but I did it anyway. After you drag crack.exe and drop it on top of fl.exe, FL studio should open and be fully functional with no restrictions.

If you are a vista user you can now reboot out of safe mode, or if you're an XP user go and make some fucking music!!!!

Peace out y'all.

PS - I'll be getting a Yamaha YPT-400 keyboard for Christmas so Timbaland you better look out!!!
